0.8.9.en: Support for Norwegian and added support for capabilities measure_battery, meter_gas, meter_water, and meter_rain in Sensor

0.9.0.en: Fixes ability to set the energy consumption (issue #111)

0.9.2.en: Upload of own icons & allow min & max target_temperatur to be set on pairing.

0.9.3.en: Fix for min & max target_temperature & step-size can be set when pairing

0.9.4.en: Allow decimals for measure_temperature to be set

0.9.5.en: Fix issue #133: Crash when removing device or mode

1.0.2.en: Added: Contribution options: Patreon and GithubSponsors (with PayPal already available).

1.0.4.en: Improved: Target/measure temperature adjustments: Min (-100 min, 50 max, 0.1 step), Max (0 min, 200 max, 0.1 step), Step (0 min, 5 max, 0.1 step) and Decimals (0 min, 5 max, 0.1 step).

1.1.1.en: Improved: Target/measure temperature adjustments: Min (-200 min, 500 max, 0.1 step), Max (-200 min, 500 max, 0.1 step), Step (0 min, 5 max, 0.1 step) and Decimals (0 min, 5 max, 0.1 step).

1.1.2.en: Improved and now correct: Target/measure temperature adjustments: Min (-200 min, 500 max, 0.1 step), Max (-200 min, 500 max, 0.1 step), Step (0 min, 5 max, 0.1 step) and Decimals (0 min, 5 max, 0.1 step).

1.2.0.en: Improved: New flowcard in which you select an existing sensor/capability, instead of typing the sensorname.

1.2.1.en: Improved: New flowcard in which you select an existing sensor/capability, instead of typing the sensorname.

1.2.2.en: Resolved: Custom icons were deleted after creation of a new VD.

1.2.3.en: Resolved: Custom icons for Mode device were also deleted after creation of a new VD.
